page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content: THERE IS ONLY ONE POLICEMAN IN OUR AREA HE IS P.C. EILBECK HE COMES TO OUR SCHOOL TO TALK TO US ABOUT SOME DANGERS. WE FOUND OUT THAT MR EILBECK ARRESTS ABOUT 3-4 PEOPLE EVERY WEEK. THE MAIN CRIMES IN OUR AREA ARE THEFT AND VANDALISM.MR. EILBECK DOES NOT USE DOGS.HE ONLY HAS 1 CAR THAT IS MADE BY FORD.HE HAS WORKED IN THIS AREA FOR 7 YEARS,BUT HAS BEEN A POLICEMAN FOR 18 YEARS.MR.EILBECK WORKS 2-3 HOURS A DAY AROUND THORNHILL AREA. HE'S NOT INVOLVED WITH TRAFFIC ON THE MAIN ROAD.IF SOMEONE COMMITS A CRIME MR. EILBEAK WEARS A FLAT HAT. MR. EILBECK GETS PEOPLE COMING TO HIS STATION HOUSE WITH LOST PROPERTY.WE DID A SURVEY OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE WITNESSED A CRIME 16 HAVE AND 8 HAV'ENT WWITNESSED A CRIME.
